entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:30 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow ending early this morning then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
